opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Thompson v. Crosby, Secretary, Florida Department of Corrections

opinion:
544 U.S. 957

THOMPSON
v.
CROSBY, SECRETARY, FLORIDA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS.

No. 03-6245.

Supreme Court of United States.

April 4, 2005.

1

C. A. 11th Cir. Reported below: 320 F. 3d 1228. Motions of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted, judgments vacated, and cases remanded for further consideration in light of Rhines v. Weber, ante, p. 269.
